thread.title: The Latest: Blatter's lawyer says procedure not followed
thread.title_full: The Latest: Blatter's lawyer says procedure not followed

title: The Latest: Blatter's lawyer says procedure not followed
text: Updated: 7:58 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 | Posted: 7:58 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 The Latest: Blatter's lawyer says procedure not followed Related View Larger FILE - In this Friday, Dec. 19, 2014 file photo FIFA president Sepp Blatter and FIFA secretary general Jerome Valcke, left, leave after a press conference in Marrakech, Morocco. On Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and the former secretary general Valcke for 90 days. (AP Photo/Christophe Ena, File) The FIFA logo is pictured at the FIFA headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and UEFA President Michel Platini for 90 days. (Dominic Steinmann/Keystone via AP) Sponsored Links
